/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/Data_Renderer/data_rasterizer.cu.o CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/Data_Renderer/ray_intersect.cu.o CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/Data_Renderer/renderer.cu.o CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/Render_DS/Image.cu.o CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/Render_DS/mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/Render_DS/model_loader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/Render_DS/ppc.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/arg_parse.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/shadow_base.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -o shadow_base   -L/usr/local/cuda-11.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  Dep/fmt/libfmtd.a Dep/tinyobjloader/libtinyobjloader.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
